Uses of Class
opendial.inference.Query

  • Packages that use Query 
    Package Description
    opendial.inference  
    opendial.inference.approximate  

    • Uses of Query in opendial.inference

      Subclasses of Query in opendial.inference 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Query.ProbQuery
      Representation of a probability query P(queryVars | evidence) on a specific Bayesian network.
      static class  Query.ReduceQuery
      Representation of a reduction Query where the Bayesian network is reduced to a new network containing only the variables queryVars, and integrating the evidence.
      static class  Query.UtilQuery
      Representation of an utility query U(queryVars | evidence) on a specific Bayesian network.
      Methods in opendial.inference with parameters of type Query 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      InferenceAlgorithm SwitchingAlgorithm.selectBestAlgorithm(Query query) 

    • Uses of Query in opendial.inference.approximate

      Methods in opendial.inference.approximate with parameters of type Query 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EmpiricalDistribution SamplingAlgorithm.getWeightedSamples(Query query, java.util.function.Consumer<java.util.Collection<Sample>> weightScheme)
      Returns an empirical distribution for the particular query, after reweighting each samples based on the provided weighting scheme.
      Constructors in opendial.inference.approximate with parameters of type Query 
      Constructor and Description
      LikelihoodWeighting(Query query, int nbSamples, long maxSamplingTime)
      Creates a new sampling query with the given arguments and starts sampling (using parallel streams).
